SEARCH
Package src.view

Class HospitalAppView

Object
MainView
HospitalAppView
public class HospitalAppView extends MainView
The HospitalAppView class provides the user interface for logging in to the hospital system and accessing different views based on the user's role. It handles the user login process and directs users to the appropriate role-based view.
Since:
2024-11-20
Version:
1.0
Author:
Seann

      public HospitalAppView()

  • Method Details

    • userLogin

      public String userLogin()
      Manages the login process for the user. Prompts the user for hospital ID and password, and validates login credentials. If successful, the user's role is stored and used to provide the correct view.
      Returns:
      the hospital ID of the logged-in user.

    • viewApp

      public void viewApp(String hospitalID)
      Displays the hospital app view for the logged-in user. Directs the user to the appropriate role-based view.
      Specified by:
      viewApp in class MainView
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - the ID of the hospital.

    • printMenu

      public void printMenu()
      Prints the main menu for the hospital app based on the current user's role. Directs the user to their respective view: admin, patient, doctor, or pharmacist.
      Specified by:
      printMenu in class MainView
